timeline.bodyText:
Should be
:func:`hamming_distance`

as according to the Release Notes Guideline
timeline.author: caithagoras
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.244
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Improve performance of NestedLoopJoinOperator.
+* Add support for spilling joins when using materialized exchanges.
+
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix an issue where queries could encounter an int overflow error during spilling.
+* Fix hamming_distance to handle code point zero correctly.

timeline.bodyText:
This sentence is incomplete, could you check the PR of this release note item?
Also,
Double back quote instead of single back quotes
timeline.author: caithagoras
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.244
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Improve performance of NestedLoopJoinOperator.
+* Add support for spilling joins when using materialized exchanges.
+
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix an issue where queries could encounter an int overflow error during spilling.
+* Fix hamming_distance to handle code point zero correctly.
+* Fix caching and case-sensitivity bugs with type signatures for enum types.
+* Fix LambdaDefinitionExpression canonicalization to correctly canonicalize Block constant (:issue:15424).
+* Improve performance of NestedLoopJoinOperator.
+* Add `peak_node_total_memory` to statistics to allow monitoring the peak sum of memory used across tasks at any node by a query.
+* Add support for spilling joins when using materialized exchanges.
+* Add thrift transport support for TaskStatus which can be enabled using config property ``experimental.internal-communication.thrift-transport-enabled``.
+
+Verifier Changes
+________________
+* Fix an issue where queries are always directed to the first cluster when multiple control or test clusters are specified.
+* Improve verifier handling of memory limits by using the limits from the verifier cluster which are frequently better matched to the queries picked to be run in the verifier suite.
+* Add control and test session properties to Verifier output.
+
+Druid Changes
+_____________
+* Fix druid reading issue.
+
+Hive Changes
+____________
+* Fix a bug with reading encrypted DWRF tables where queries could fail with a NullPointerException.
+* Add support for AWS SDK client request metrics and Glue API metrics to GlueHiveMetastore.
+
+Pinot Changes
+_____________
+* Enabled it by setting `pinot.use-streaming-for-segment-queries=true`.

timeline.bodyText: You can check the original PR to see if we can expand the description here, in terms of what is the issue.

timeline.bodyText:
Verifier changes should be listed after all the Connector changes. After Pinot changes in this case.
https://github.com/prestodb/presto/wiki/Release-Notes-Guidelines#order-of-sections

timeline.bodyText:
I think it should be just one bullet point. Also the sentence should start with Add support for querying Pinot server ...
https://github.com/prestodb/presto/wiki/Release-Notes-Guidelines#phrasing
timeline.author: NikhilCollooru
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.244
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Improve performance of NestedLoopJoinOperator.
+* Add support for spilling joins when using materialized exchanges.
+
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix an issue where queries could encounter an int overflow error during spilling.
+* Fix :func:`hamming_distance` to handle code point zero correctly.
+* Fix caching and case-sensitivity bugs with type signatures for enum types.
+* Fix LambdaDefinitionExpression canonicalization to correctly canonicalize Block constant (:issue:15424).
+* Improve performance of NestedLoopJoinOperator.
+* Add `peak_node_total_memory` to statistics to allow monitoring the peak sum of memory used across tasks at any node by a query.
+* Add support for spilling joins when using materialized exchanges.
+* Add thrift transport support for TaskStatus which can be enabled using config property ``experimental.internal-communication.thrift-transport-enabled``.
+
+Verifier Changes
+________________
+* Fix an issue where queries are always directed to the first cluster when multiple control or test clusters are specified.
+* Improve verifier handling of memory limits by using the limits from the verifier cluster which are frequently better matched to the queries picked to be run in the verifier suite.
+* Add control and test session properties to Verifier output.
+
+Druid Changes
+_____________
+* Fix druid reading issue caused by using the ARRAY_LINES result format.
+
+Hive Changes
+____________
+* Fix a bug with reading encrypted DWRF tables where queries could fail with a NullPointerException.
+* Add support for AWS SDK client request metrics and Glue API metrics to GlueHiveMetastore.
+
+Pinot Changes
+_____________
+* Support query Pinot server with streaming API (Requires Pinot Version >= 0.6.0.).

+* Fix an issue where queries could encounter an int overflow error during spilling.
+* Fix :func:`hamming_distance` to handle code point zero correctly.

+* Fix LambdaDefinitionExpression canonicalization to correctly canonicalize Block constant (:issue:15424).

timeline.bodyText:
This line is too long and complicated.
Improve handling of memory limits by using the verifier cluster's memory limits instead of the limits defined while running the query.
timeline.author: mayankgarg1990

@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.244
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Improve performance of NestedLoopJoinOperator.
+* Add support for spilling joins when using materialized exchanges.

+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix an issue where queries could encounter an int overflow error during spilling.
+* Fix :func:`hamming_distance` to handle code point zero correctly.
+* Fix caching and case-sensitivity bugs with type signatures for enum types.
+* Fix LambdaDefinitionExpression canonicalization to correctly canonicalize Block constant (:issue:15424).
+* Improve performance of NestedLoopJoinOperator.
+* Add `peak_node_total_memory` to statistics to allow monitoring the peak sum of memory used across tasks at any node by a query.
+* Add support for spilling joins when using materialized exchanges.
+* Add thrift transport support for TaskStatus which can be enabled using config property ``experimental.internal-communication.thrift-transport-enabled``.
+
+Druid Changes
+_____________
+* Fix druid reading issue caused by using the ARRAY_LINES result format.
+
+Hive Changes
+____________
+* Fix a bug with reading encrypted DWRF tables where queries could fail with a NullPointerException.
+* Add support for AWS SDK client request metrics and Glue API metrics to GlueHiveMetastore.
+
+Pinot Changes
+_____________
+* Add support for querying Pinot server with streaming API (with Pinot version >= 0.6.0); The API can be enabled by setting ``pinot.use-streaming-for-segment-queries=true``.
+

+Verifier Changes

+* Fix an issue where queries are always directed to the first cluster when multiple control or test clusters are specified.
+* Improve verifier handling of memory limits by using the limits from the verifier cluster which are frequently better matched to the queries picked to be run in the verifier suite.

timeline.bodyText: Maybe say "cross joins" instead.  NestedLoopJoinOperator is probably more technical than we need here.
timeline.author: rschlussel

timeline.bodyText: use the more user focused description from the issue:  Fix a bug where queries could produce wrong results when they have multiple lambda expressions that only differ in complex type constants
timeline.author: rschlussel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.244
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Improve performance of ``NestedLoopJoinOperator``.
+* Add support for spilling joins when using materialized exchanges.
+
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix an issue where queries could encounter an int overflow error during spilling.
+* Fix :func:`hamming_distance` to handle code point zero correctly.
+* Fix caching and case-sensitivity bugs with type signatures for enum types.
+* Fix LambdaDefinitionExpression canonicalization to correctly canonicalize Block constant (:issue:15424).

timeline.bodyText: change this as well with cross joins based on @rschlussel 's suggestion
timeline.author: mayankgarg1990
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.244
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Improve performance of cross joins.
+* Add support for spilling joins when using materialized exchanges.
+
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix an issue where queries could encounter an int overflow error during spilling.
+* Fix :func:`hamming_distance` to handle code point zero correctly.
+* Fix caching and case-sensitivity bugs with type signatures for enum types.
+* Fix a bug where queries could produce wrong results when they have multiple lambda expressions that only differ in complex type constants (:issue:15424).
+* Improve performance of ``NestedLoopJoinOperator``.
